data.eml:eml: Schistura alboguttata, a new loach species of the family Nemacheilidae (Pisces: Cypriniformes) from the Pearl River basin in Guangxi, South China

This dataset contains the digitized treatments in Plazi based on the original journal article Cao, Liang, Zhang, E. (2018): Schistura alboguttata, a new loach species of the family Nemacheilidae (Pisces: Cypriniformes) from the Pearl River basin in Guangxi, South China. Zootaxa 4471 (1): 125-136, DOI: https://doi.org/10.11646/zootaxa.4471.1.5
